welcome-section.title: The content of the future is in your hands!

tools-section.title: All tools in one place
tools-section.subtitle: All the tools for content creation — from script generation to YouTube trend analysis — are gathered on one platform.

benefits-section.title: Our benefits
benefits-section.generation-card-text: Save time by creating quality scripts in minutes
benefits-section.trends-card-text: Get inspired, create, and rise higher, knowing what's relevant today
benefits-section.integration-card-text: Instantly publish your videos to YouTube through our platform
benefits-section.professional-card-text: We provide comprehensive solutions for production automation, suitable for both novice bloggers and large studios

retention.title: Retention
retention.text: +45% for the last month! Your feedback inspires us to create even more interesting content.

view.title: Views
view.text: +60%! We are grateful for your activity and engagement, which helps us reach new heights.

subscriptions.title: Subscriptions
subscriptions.text: +30%! Your desire to share our materials with friends is the best compliment and motivation for our team.

analysis-section.title: Global trend analysis
analysis-section.subtitle: Our analytics tool tracks global YouTube trends, offering you ideas for topics and formats that are already trending or about to break through.

timestamps-section.title: Timestamps
timestamps-section.subtitle: Make viewing more convenient and your content more professional!
timestamps-section.description: Our system automatically divides your videos into chapters and adds timestamps, allowing viewers to quickly find specific moments, enhancing their viewing experience and encouraging them to return to your videos.

script-section.title: Script Creation
script-section.subtitle: AI-Generated Scripts Customizable to Your Needs

thumbnails-section.title: Ai-generated Thumbnails and Editor
thumbnails-section.subtitle: The platform automatically suggests several catchy preview options tailored to your topics. The built-in editor allows you to instantly add essential details that give your cover a unique touch.

integration-section.title: Simple and secure integration with YouTube
integration-section.description: Link your account, and the platform makes the publishing process fast and easy. You can manage all your content with peace of mind regarding security. Publishing happens directly from your dashboard, so you no longer need to switch between applications.
integration-section.user-card-text: Wants a seamless video upload process.
integration-section.youtube-card-text: Provide predictive analytics for your channel.

example-section.title: Example of Our Service
example-section.subtitle: See how our tools streamline video creation, from script generation to final edits, delivering high-quality results quickly and effortlessly

faq-section.title: Frequently ask questions
faq-section.subtitle: Ask everything you need to know about our services

try-now-section.title: Try out the features for free!
try-now-section.subtitle: Sign up and try all the features of our platform. Scripts, trends, covers — everything you need to create a viral video is ready and waiting for you!

coming-soon-section.title: AI Video Editing
coming-soon-section.subtitle: Our AI-powered video editing tool will soon simplify content creation, making it faster and easier than ever

best-prices-section.title: Best prices in industry!
best-prices-section.subtitle: By allowing instant access to specific moments, they enhance the overall viewing experience and encourage audience interaction.

footer.title: Perfect Videos in Minutes
footer.subtitle: Simple tools for generating scripts, timestamps, and thumbnails. Try it for free or choose the professional plan for full control

slide1.title: Create your own channel database and track the signals according to the installed filters. Always hold your hand on the pulse of current trends!

slide2.title: Is there already an idea for video? Put her into our analizer and look at what videos in different languages ​​came out on this subject. Determine the best name and preview for your video!

slide3.title: Do you already have a finished video? Divide it into chapters using our system in 3 clicks: download the video - generate the names of the chapters - pour the timepers on the video!

data.input_placeholder: Enter keywords or names for the future video to analyze the topic and choose the best title and thumbnail

data.title: AI Scenario
data.text: This scenario is generated automatically. Our AI-powered scenario generator creates unique stories based on your input. It selects the best format, structure, facts, and delivery to keep viewers engaged. The system adapts to YouTube, documentaries, blogs, and interviews, generating scenarios that truly captivate and keep viewers hooked.

stepsData.title: Generate timestamps automatically

stepsData.description2: After upload, choose the preferred timestamp interval length to better match the video structure

subBlock.title: This is Timestamps
subBlock.text: Timestamps help viewers quickly find the most interesting parts of your video. Our tools automatically analyze content and create accurate markers to highlight key moments, chapters, and topics — improving engagement, navigation, and saving time.
